title: ZoneEnter
description: Enter declaration of a fishing zone

activity_date.description: The datetime of the arrival in UTC. GBR: DATI, NLD2: DA + TI, NLD3: DA

location.description: The geographical location where the entry took place

catch_on_board.description: The previously caught fish present on the vessel at the time of entry
catch_on_board.title: Catch on board

target_species.description: An indication of the target species for the fishing activity. NLD: TS, GBR: TS

directed_species.description: An indication of the directed species for the fishing activity. GBR: GBRDS

effort_zone.description: The fishing effort zone. Example: A (ICES V-VI). GBR: GBRFE

trans_zonal_fishing.description: Indicates the vessel has engaged in trans-zonal fishing: GRB: GBRTRZ
